timeline.message:
Initial setup of new events.

- Currently throws an NPE on startup, but I have other things to do atm.

Adds NationGenericToggleEvent and TownGenericToggleEvents

- Fixes missing "static" on two other recent events.

Big change over to using abstract toggle and pretoggle events for towns
and nations, as well as an preEvent and event for each toggle command.

Redo using CommandSender instead of Player, include boolean indicating
it is an admin action.

Lets just redo it again then shall we.

- Scraps multiple events for one cancellable event per-toggle.
- These events fire after all other Towny-side decisions are made on
whether the action is allowed by the sender.
- Adds bonus TownToggleCustomEvent & NationToggleCustomEvent which is
fired when a subcommand we dont recognize is used.
  - Defaults to cancelled but is fired to allow another plugin to be
able to see the args used in order to simulate their having a proper /t
toggle command.
- Switches help menus over to using the newer HelpMenu object.
- General commenting.
- Fix the new javadocs.
